wmndsTextareaProps.name: classes
wmndsTextareaProps.description: List of aditional classes which will be added to the textarea.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: id
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Required. Must be unique. Used as an id and name attribute. It is linked to the textarea label.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: autofocus
wmndsTextareaProps.description: If true, the text area should automatically get focus when the page loads. Defaults to false.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: disabled
wmndsTextareaProps.description: If true, textarea should be disabled. Defaults to false.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: formId
wmndsTextareaProps.description: The form id from the form which the text area belongs to. It's an optional field.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: maxLength
wmndsTextareaProps.description: The maxLength is the maximum number of characters allowed in the text area. It's an optional field.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: placeholder
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Placeholder is a short hint that describes the expected value of a text area. It's an optional field.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: required
wmndsTextareaProps.description: If true, textarea is required/must be filled out. Defaults to false.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: rows
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Rows are the visible number of lines in a text area. Default is 3.
